question:
Consider the following statements about Intensive agriculture:
  1. More than one type of crop is raised on the same field
  2. Vegetables and cereals are most commonly grown in this type of agriculture
  3. Farm size is small but yield per unit area is high
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
Intensive agriculture is an agricultural production system characterized by:
More than one type of crop is raised on the same field
Vegetables and cereals are most commonly grown in this type of agriculture
Farm size is small but yield per unit area is high
Highly practiced in coastal plains and northern India
